QuestData.Title: Trail of Filth
QuestData.Description: The trail of filth and anger leads into the ruined town hall. Surely there is a slime breeding pool inside the structure. Fight your way inside and deal with whatever angry slime-breeder that you encounter!$B$BShould you succeed Serge Hinott at the Ruins of Southshore will surely want to hear about it.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps with Chet vanquished, the lethality levels of this place will decrease a tad faster. A job well done, $n!
